title: Track Product Batch in Pipeline
description: A scheduler tracks a batch of premium gasoline as it moves through a multi-product pipeline to ensure it doesn't mix with other products.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current location and estimated volume of batch 'G-93-05' in the pipeline system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the batch's current position and integrity.

tasks.description: Calculate the batch's ETA at the next major junction or delivery point.
tasks.expected_outcome: An updated ETA is calculated based on current flow rates.

tasks.description: Notify the downstream terminal to prepare for receiving the batch and to line up the correct tankage.
tasks.expected_outcome: A notification is sent to the receiving terminal with the updated ETA and batch details.
